Three's Company is an American sitcom that aired for eight seasons on ABC from 
March 15, 1977 to September 18, 1984. It is based on the British sitcom Man 
About the House. The story revolves around three single roommates: Janet Wood 
(Joyce DeWitt), Chrissy Snow (Suzanne Somers), ... Don Knotts as Ralph Furley (
seasons 48)  The trio's goofy, yet friendly,...
